name: Spinning Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Spinning Slash</font>
info:
Spin in place to carve every foe around you, then repeat the input to hurl yourself forward into another whirling slash that continues the assault. When wielded on the Dragon Halberd, the follow-up strike releases ice lightning that adds <font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite</font> buildup, and 10 extra <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> to every hit, and it cannot be parried when consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (throwing blades):</font> 13
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (daggers):</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (halberds/reapers/spears):</font> 26
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (greatswords/curved greatswords/greataxes/great spears):</font> 29
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (straight swords/curved swords/backhand blades/katanas/axes):</font> 33
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (light greatswords):</font> 36

name: Loretta's Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Loretta's Slash</font>
info:
Leap forward while cloaking the blade in glintstone, then dive into a sweeping slash as you land to catch distant foes. Each follow-up inherits any weapon buffs already on the armament, the hit deals both <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> and <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>, scales with the weapon's scaling, costs 14 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, and cannot be parried. Wearing the Spellblade Set increases the damage.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (leap):</font> 12
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (finisher):</font> 10
<font color="#C0B194">

name: Storm Assault
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Storm Assault</font>
info: Wrap yourself in a cyclone, leap forward, and drive the armament into the ground to detonate another spiral of storm winds at the point of impact. The takeoff gust damages foes around you before the diving thrust lands, and the swirling winds linger briefly to pin targets in place. The skill costs 22 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, is not chargeable, and Enraged Divine Beast boosts its damage by 10%.

name: Stormcaller
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Stormcaller</font>
info:
Spin the armament to surround yourself with storm winds, then repeat the input up to two times to step forward and unfold wider cyclones. The skill costs 9 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> (11 for the heavy attack version), cannot be parried while consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, becomes parryable if performed without any <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, and Enraged Divine Beast boosts its damage by 10%.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (initial sweep):</font> 24
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (first follow-up):</font> 12
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (second follow-up):</font> 12

name: Glintblade Phalanx
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Glintblade Phalanx</font>
info: Conjure four magical dagger projectiles overhead; they hover defensively until they automatically launch at the nearest enemy once they enter range. Following up with a strong attack chains the skill into a lunging thrust, and the glintblades can even track invisible foes so long as they have a clear path. Each blade shatters the instant it touches any geometry, so casting in tight quarters can waste the shots.

name: Flaming Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Flaming Strike</font>
info:
Sweep your off-hand to send out a short arc of flame, then follow up with a lunging slash that cuts through the blaze and coats the armament in fire. The follow-up buff adds 90 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> to the weapon for 40 seconds regardless of its affinity, but attempting the skill with no <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> produces no flame, fails to apply the buff, and greatly weakens the follow-up. The ignition wave cannot be parried although the lunging slash can.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (projectile):</font> 138
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (both hits):</font> 15

name: Parry
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Parry</font>
info:
Swing your armament with precise timing to deflect an incoming melee attack, breaking the enemy stance and usually opening them to a critical hit. Only certain melee attacks can be parried, and the timing window changes with the armament performing the skill.

On small shields Parry has 4 start-up frames and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS). Daggers share 4 start-up frames and 4 parry frames, while medium shields, thrusting swords, curved swords, fists, and claws have 4 start-up frames and 2 parry frames at 30 FPS, demanding stricter timing.

name: Buckler Parry
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Buckler Parry</font>
info:
Take a braced stance with the buckler and flick it out just before impact to deflect the attack, breaking the enemy stance and typically allowing a critical hit. Only parryable melee attacks can be turned aside, so spacing and timing still matter.

Buckler Parry keeps the small-shield timing of 4 start-up frames and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS) but its deflection point occurs slightly earlier, letting you answer fast swings more reliably.

name: Parry
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Parry</font>
info:
Use precise timing to swat aside a melee attack and stagger the foe, setting up a critical riposte if you are close enough. Only parryable melee strings can be deflected, so recognizing an opponent's moveset is key.

Small shields share 4 frames of start-up and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS, daggers share 4 frames of start-up and 4 active frames, and medium shields, thrusting swords, curved swords, fists, and claws only give 2 active parry frames after the same 4-frame start-up.

name: Storm Wall
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Storm Wall</font>
info:
Swing the shield to raise a short wall of storm winds that flicks away small physical projectiles and can also parry melee attacks to break an enemy stance.

The projectile deflection activates instantly and grants 10 active frames, while the melee parry has 4 start-up frames and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS). Always consumes <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> even if nothing is deflected, and it only reflects lighter physical shots - great arrows and other heavy projectiles will still break through.

name: Thops's Barrier
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Thops's Barrier</font>
info:
Swing the shield through a conjured sigil to nullify an incoming sorcery or incantation, or parry a melee attack to break an enemy stance.

The barrier appears after 3 start-up frames and grants 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS), giving it a slightly later but tighter window than a small-shield parry while remaining identical regardless of the armament using it. Only parryable melee strings and hostile spells can be reflected, and the timing stays consistent on every shield.

name: Enchanted Shot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Enchanted Shot</font>
info:
Hold the bow in a steady stance to infuse the next arrow with guiding essence, causing it to fly faster than normal, curve toward its target, and reach farther. While this stance is active each shot deals 50% more damage, builds 50% more status with every hit, and costs 50% more <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> than a regular arrow, but it still cannot pierce shields the way Mighty Shot does.

Used without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, the arrow loses its tracking, speed boost, and damage bonus, leaving only a 5% increase over a normal shot.

name: Sky Shot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Sky Shot</font>
info:
Crouch in a low stance to fire an arrow almost straight upward so it rains down on the spot where the target stood when released, often registering as a headshot and clearing low cover along the way.

Shots fired this way deal 33% more damage than a normal arrow. Holding the stance slows <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by roughly 80% and ends immediately if you move, and because the arrow locks on to the original location it is far easier to use against unaware or stationary foes; shots against a target's back tend to hit the neck for reduced damage.

name: Rain of Arrows
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Rain of Arrows</font>
info:
Hold to crouch in a low archery stance, firing each shot nearly straight up so it splits into a rain that lands where the target stood.

Each barrage deals 50% of the arrow's normal damage and status buildup per projectile but can strike targets multiple times before the effect ends. The skill can be activated as long as you have at least 1 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> remaining.

name: Storm Stomp
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Storm Stomp</font>
info:
Stomp to summon a tight cyclone that hits around you, keeping foes locked in hitstun and setting up follow-up attacks with the bound armament. Cannot be parried.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (wind):</font> 50
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 6

name: Kick
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Kick</font>
info:
Deliver a fast, high kick that instantly staggers guarding enemies, opening them to a guard break while you are bare-handed in either hand. The skill is not chargeable and cannot be parried.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 6

name: Bubble Shower
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Bubble Shower</font>
info:
Blow the horn to launch a slow-moving spray of bubbles that drift forward before raining down in front of you. The volley deals pure <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>, cannot be charged, costs 16 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, and hits even harder when you wear the Envoy Crown.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 65
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 72 (92 if all bubbles hit)

name: Moonlight Greatsword
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Moonlight Greatsword</font>
info:
Raise the sword aloft to wreathe it in the dark moon's light for 60 seconds, adding 65 <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> and 15 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> to every attack. Heavy attacks during the buff launch moonlight projectiles, while the buffed swings still deal their full status and stance but only roughly 50% of their normal damage (65% when the projectile is charged); only the activation consumes <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, firing the moonlight waves costs stamina, and the heavy swing hitbox can still be parried.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (projectile):</font> 15
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (projectile, charged):</font> 24
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (projectile):</font> 120% of the weapon's frost buildup
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (projectile, charged):</font> 150% of the weapon's frost buildup
note: Fex cache confirms +65 magic/+15 frost for 60s with 15/24 stance waves and stamina-only projectiles; mod's +85/+100 buff values are outdated.

name: Bear Witness!
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Bear Witness!</font>
info:
Drag the small dragon head along the ground into a fire-laced uppercut before launching a wide barrage of fireballs overhead. The volley deals pure <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>, scales exclusively with <font color="#E0B985">faith</font> (not <font color="#F395C4">strength</font> or <font color="#F395C4">dexterity</font>), costs 20 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, cannot be charged, can be used from either hand like a shield skill, and benefits from the Talisman of the Dread and Fire Scorpion Charm.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 20

name: Taker's Flames
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Taker's Flames</font>
info:
Raise the blade to wreath it in blasphemous flame before slamming forward and sending a chain of eruptions along the ground. The eruption wave deals pure <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>, scales only with <font color="#E0B985">faith</font>, costs 30 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, cannot be charged or parried, and benefits from the Talisman of the Dread and Fire Scorpion Charm while each enemy struck restores HP as the chain travels.

<font color="#E0B985">HP restored per enemy:</font> 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 150
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 22

name: Spearcall Ritual
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Spearcall Ritual</font>
info:
Hoist the spear skyward to summon a cluster of spectral spears above the target that rain down after a short delay, dealing pure <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>. Costs 20 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, cannot be charged, and wearing the Spellblade Set increases the damage while it scales with weapon upgrade level and <font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 26 (<font color="#E0B985">weapon upgrade level</font>, <font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>)

name: Thundercloud Form
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Thundercloud Form</font>
info:
Transform into a rushing red thundercloud and fly through the air before plunging down with a lightning-charged strike; holding the skill extends the cloud's travel distance while charging only increases its reach and leaves the Godfrey Icon powerless. Both the passing lightning and plunge deal pure <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font>, cannot be parried, cost 28 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, and the cloud ticks for 6 stance damage per tick before the plunge deals 11 stance damage (33 when charged), reaching up to 55 stance damage if the whole charged chain connects.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (passing bolt):</font> 6 per tick
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (plunge):</font> 11
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (plunge, charged):</font> 33

name: Cursed-Blood Slice
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Cursed-Blood Slice</font>
info:
Brace, then leap into a diagonal slash that paints a cursed trail which detonates moments later; repeat with another input for a horizontal follow-up that leaves a second delayed explosion. This unique skill cannot be charged, consumes 20 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, cannot be parried while consuming FP, and becomes parryable when executed with no FP, while both strikes deal pure <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> and the explosions sidestep gradual <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> like Bloodflame Blade.

<font color="#C84343">Blood Loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosions):</font> 80
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 14

name: I Command Thee, Kneel!
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: I Command Thee, Kneel!</font>
info:
Slam the axe into the ground twice in succession to unleash two wide shockwaves, then repeat the skill for a third, larger shockwave. The shockwaves deal heavy <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font>, cannot be charged, and cost 15 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>; they cannot be parried while FP is consumed but become parryable if the skill is executed with no focus.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (full sequence):</font> 19

name: Bloodboon Ritual
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Bloodboon Ritual</font>
info:
Raise the sacred spear and pierce the Formless Mother up to three times, each thrust spawning an explosion of bloodflame that rains droplets around you before coating the weapon. The third thrust hits harder, recovers more slowly, and cannot be charged, while the armament stays imbued for 20 seconds with 30 added <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> and steady <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> on every hit; damage scales with weapon upgrade level and <font color="#E0B985">Arcane</font>, each detonation deals pure <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>, and the activation costs 20 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>.

<font color="#C84343">Blood Loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (3 inputs):</font> 21

name: Ancient Lightning Spear
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Ancient Lightning Spear</font>
info:
Imbue the armament with the ancient dragons' red lightning, take a short step forward, and fling it as a spear of pure <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> that knocks back foes when fully charged and flinches tougher enemies. Charging the skill increases the throw's attack power, and the projectile still hits sidestepping targets while benefiting from charge-enhancing effects such as Godfrey Icon.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 9 (weapon upgrade level, <font color="#E0B985">Dexterity</font>)

name: Last Rites
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Last Rites</font>
info:
Raise the epitaph to bathe yourself and nearby allies in sacred order for 60 seconds; the aura cannot be parried.

Adds 25 <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> to affected armaments and increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 10% (5% in PvP). Attacks against Those Who Live in Death deal 100% more damage during the aura and prevent them from reviving, and the buff counts as an aura that will not stack with other Sacred Order boons.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage added to armaments:</font> 25

name: Radahn's Rain
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Radahn's Rain</font>
info: Settle into Radahn's hunting stance, ready your bow, and fire a sudden flurry of arrows into the sky so each projectile splits overhead and pours down where the target stood, overwhelming foes with multiple hits. The barrage deals reduced damage and status buildup per projectile but is amplified when you switch to Radahn's Spears, and the skill is not chargeable.

name: Magma Shower
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Magma Shower</font>
info:
Slash in a tight circle to scatter pools of magma around you, then use an additional input to spin again and carpet the area in fire; each spin costs 12 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> and leaves lingering magma pools that continue scorching foes.

Each spin cannot be parried while Focus is held but becomes parryable if executed with no focus, the skill is not chargeable, and the Talisman of the Dread enhances the flames.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (magma):</font> 30
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (spin):</font> 18

name: Transient Moonlight
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Transient Moonlight</font>
info:
Sheathe the blade while moving freely, then release into a stepping horizontal slash or a short-hop vertical slash depending on the follow-up input; both slashes launch waves of light and the skill is not chargeable.

The waves deal pure <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>, scale only with <font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font> (not <font color="#E0B985">Dexterity</font> or <font color="#E0B985">Strength</font>), the Light Attack is excellent for crowd control, and the heavy attack's projectile can be aimed upward or downward with camera control; wearing Spellblade Set increases the damage and the skill activates with Rellana's Cameo.

Landing the projectile and katana hit from each release inflicts stance damage (light version 28, heavy version 30), the projectile deals 12.5 Poise damage and direct hits with the Moonveil add 15 (light) or 17.5 (heavy) for totals of 27.5 or 30 Poise damage, and the Light and Heavy attacks can be parried while the projectiles can be parried or reflected by Golden Retaliation, Ash of War: Carian Retaliation, and the Carian Retaliation sorcery.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (normal projectile):</font> 140 (<font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>)
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (strong projectile):</font> 155 (<font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>)
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (light version):</font> 28
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (heavy version):</font> 30

name: Thunderstorm
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Thunderstorm</font>
info:
Imbue the armament with lightning and spin it to surround yourself with a storm, chaining up to two additional spins with further inputs. The weapon stays infused for 40 seconds, adding 120 <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> to every attack. The skill is not chargeable, cannot be parried, and does not trigger Winged Sword Insignia, Rotten Winged Sword Insignia, or Millicent's Prosthesis.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (swirl):</font> 95
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (first swing):</font> 16
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (follow-up swings):</font> 10

name: Contagious Fury
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Contagious Fury</font>
info: Raise the jellyfish shield to channel its rage for 30 seconds, draping yourself in red energy that increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 12.5%. The skill is not chargeable, counts as a unique buff, and ends immediately if you swap the shield.

name: Dryleaf Whirlwind
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Dryleaf Whirlwind</font>
info:
Leap upward in a cyclone of four rapid kicks before driving a final heel drop into the ground, extending the reach of all kicking attacks with <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> force. The attack is not chargeable, procs multi-hit talismans such as Millicent's Prosthesis and Rotten Winged Sword Insignia, and its damage is increased by the Shattered Stone Talisman and Divine Bird Warrior Greaves.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (with FP):</font> 28
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (without FP):</font> 16

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings</font>
info:
Manifest Crucible wings, take flight, and dive weapon-first into the target; twinblades replace the thrust with an eight-spin charge. The skill is not chargeable, cannot be used without enough FP, and is enhanced by Crucible Knight armor pieces.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (colossal swords):</font> 24
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (greatswords/light greatswords/heavy thrusting swords/great spears/great katanas):</font> 22
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (twinblades/straight swords/katanas/spears/halberds):</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (thrusting swords):</font> 16
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (daggers):</font> 12
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (throwing daggers):</font> 8

name: Spinning Gravity Thrust
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Spinning Gravity Thrust</font>
info:
Use gravity to hover in place, rotate, and drive forward with a piercing thrust, then input again to crash down in another spinning strike that knocks foes back. The skill is not chargeable and works with multi-hit buffs.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (greatswords/curved greatswords/heavy thrusting swords/great katanas - first thrust):</font> 21
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (greatswords/curved greatswords/heavy thrusting swords/great katanas - follow-up):</font> 25
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (colossal swords - first thrust):</font> 23
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (colossal swords - follow-up):</font> 26

name: Palm Blast
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Palm Blast</font>
info:
Imbue your palm with energy before unleashing an explosive strike that travels slightly beyond your reach, spreading the weapon's status buildup across the blast radius. Charging widens the explosion, knocks enemies back like Rejection, and grants the poise of a fully charged Endure while increasing the stance damage it deals.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged):</font> 36

name: Piercing Throw
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Piercing Throw</font>
info:
Hurl the armament with a powerful spin to tunnel through every foe in its path while reaching roughly double the normal range; the projectile keeps its full damage on each pierce and has no falloff, though blocking still prevents damage even as the projectile continues traveling. Using the skill without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> reduces the damage and removes the piercing effect.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 3

name: Scattershot Throw
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Scattershot Throw</font>
info:
Conjure mirrored copies of the dagger in both hands, fling a cloud of 28 projectiles that can strike large foes up to four times each, then repeat the same input for a second volley; all hits count as pierce damage for counter bonuses such as Spear Talisman, and the cast gains an extra close-range hitbox. The projectiles reach roughly 50% farther than normal throws, and using the skill without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> releases only two daggers while keeping the extended range.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (per volley):</font> 11.2

name: Wall of Sparks
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Wall of Sparks</font>
info:
Scatter perfumed powder around you that ignites after a short delay into a wall of intense sparks whose element is determined by the perfume bottle; charging widens the wall, raises its damage, and the sparks cannot be parried.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (per explosion):</font> 3

name: Rolling Sparks
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Rolling Sparks</font>
info:
Spread perfumed powder in a rolling line that triggers successive explosions of sparks inheriting the bottle's properties; large targets can be struck multiple times along the trail, and the line stops releasing new hitboxes once it collides with terrain.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (per explosion):</font> 3.2

name: Raging Beast
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Raging Beast</font>
info:
Step with beastlike speed in any direction, leap upward, and rake the foe with an aerial slash before a strong-attack follow-up dives downward; holding a directional input while evading determines which flank you strike and the dash grants 6 invulnerability frames.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (opening slash):</font> 6
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (follow-up plunge):</font> 10.5

name: Savage Claws
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Savage Claws</font>
info:
Pounce onto the target and rake it with six alternating claw swipes in rapid succession, each swipe applying 60% of the weapon's status buildup to the foe.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (6-hit combo):</font> 22

name: Red Bear Hunt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Red Bear Hunt</font>
info:
Slaughter prey with a wide right swipe that spawns a lingering vacuum dealing continuous Standard damage, then repeat the input to flow into a left slash and a front double-claw sweep while the vacuums persist; the three slashes total 32.6 stance damage.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (right slash):</font> 10.4
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (left slash):</font> 10.4
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (front slash):</font> 11.6

name: Blind Spot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Blind Spot</font>
info:
Leap into a foe's blind spot and gore them from the side; directional inputs pick which flank you dash toward, the evasion grants 6 invulnerability frames, and the resulting stab slips below their guard while dealing <font color="#F395C4">pierce damage</font> that bypasses blocking.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (stab):</font> 10

name: Swift Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Swift Slash</font>
info:
Step forward with a razor-quick cut that slices through foes and fires a shearing vacuum whose repeated hits rapidly build status; charging increases the strike's power and the distance of the forward step.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (uncharged slash):</font> 10
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged slash):</font> 20

name: Overhead Stance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Overhead Stance</font>
info:
Enter a high guard, then follow a light attack with a stepping downward slash or a strong attack with a series of plunging blows. This skill is not chargeable, counts as a stance skill, and is buffed by <font color="#E0B985">Rellana's Cameo</font>.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (light follow-up):</font> 11
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (heavy series):</font> 22

name: Wing Stance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Wing Stance</font>
info:
Hold a <font color="#E0B985">poise</font>d right-sided guard before releasing a rapid three-slash light combo or a leaping heavy thrust; holding the Skill button after the light follow-up immediately returns you to the stance so you can loop again while the heavy thrust has extra end lag before resetting, leaps over low/ground attacks, and still fails to count as a jumping attack. While wielded one-handed, the light follow-up can chain into the heavy for a multi-hit combo. The skill can be parried, is not chargeable, and is buffed by <font color="#E0B985">Rellana's Cameo</font>.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (light chain):</font> 16.5
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (heavy thrust):</font> 30.2

name: Blinkbolt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Blinkbolt</font>
info:
Transform into a bolt of lightning from a low stance and rush straight ahead even when locked onto a target. Deals minimal <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> while surging forward and, after 14 frames of startup, grants 16 invulnerability frames that let you ignore incoming attacks.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 1

name: Flame Skewer
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Flame Skewer</font>
info:
Enwreathe the armament in fire, dip into a low stance, and skewer the target in one thrust before a strong-attack follow-up fans flames across the front; the opening thrust can be parried and the skill is not chargeable. Adds 95 <font color="#F48C25">fire attack rating</font> to the armament for 15 seconds.

name: Savage Lion's Claw

info:
Somersault forward, landing a weaker Lion's Claw slash, a regular attack during the flip, and a finishing Lion's Claw slam, with an additional input enabling the final strike; the three-hit sequence is not chargeable, each hit inherits your weapon's damage type, and the skill costs 20 <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font>.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (straight swords/axes/twinblades/katanas/curved swords):</font> 42.5

name: Divine Beast Frost Stomp
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Divine Beast Frost Stomp</font>
info:
Lift a leg high and stamp it down to send a ground-hugging wave of frost straight ahead that detonates into spikes and ice explosions along its path, dealing <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>; charging increases the wave's range and power, the skill costs 30 <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font>, and the attack is chargeable. The wave also inflicts frostbite buildup on the spikes and each explosion.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

name: Flame Spear
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Flame Spear</font>
info:
Ready a thrust imbued with flame, then unleash a fiery spear straight ahead; charging the attack increases damage and travel distance. The buff coats the armament in flame for 40 seconds, adding 95 <font color="#F48C25">fire attack rating</font>, and the projectile fires the moment the thrust launches. name: Carian Sovereignty
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Carian Sovereignty</font>
info:
Transform the blade into a massive magical greatsword and slam it down, with an additional input producing a horizontal sweep; charge either attack for greater force. A fully charged slam releases a ground shockwave that sends two bursts in a line, each dealing roughly 40% of the slam's damage, and a single foe cannot be hit by both the slam and the bursts. The follow-up sweep matches the initial cast in raw damage. All hits deal pure <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>, weapon upgrade level, and infusion affinity (Magic granting the highest output), and the skill grants hyper armor while casting (118 <font color="#E0B985">poise</font> on greatswords, curved greatswords, and heavy thrusting swords, 104 on great katanas, 60 on light greatswords, 30 on straight swords/twinblades/katanas/curved swords, 28 on thrusting swords, and 22 on daggers).

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged slam):</font> 48 (<font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>)
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged follow-up sweep):</font> 45 (<font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>)

name: Shriek of Sorrow
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Shriek of Sorrow</font>
info: Unleash a harrowing scream that makes nearby foes flinch before channeling resentment into your weapon for 40 seconds based on your remaining HP. The buff locks in at the HP when cast, increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> by 10% at 100% HP, 15% at 85% HP, 20% at 55% HP, and 25% at 30% HP or lower (7.5%, 10%, 15%, and 20% in PvP), and adds +5 <font color="#E0B985">Strength</font> scaling to the weapon until you recast; it cannot be parried, counts as a weapon buff (so it does not stack with greases), and Roar Medallion has no effect.

name: Shield Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Shield Strike</font>
info: Bash forward with the equipped shield and input repeatedly to chain up to three additional shield strikes. When assigned off-hand it gives the shield its own light attack string so you can keep the main-hand skill, effectively allowing the shield to use its light attack instead of the main-hand Skill, and the ability is not chargeable.

name: Igon's Drake Hunt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Igon's Drake Hunt</font>
info: Draw the bow with a guttural bellow to enter a stance, then release either a light or heavy shot to fire a twisted arrow as soon as you press the corresponding attack. Holding the skill button prepares the bow so the respective arrow launches quickly, consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> (and stamina while in combat). Each shot deals roughly 75% more damage than normal arrows and does not benefit from roar damage bonuses (Roar Medallion has no effect).

name: Ghostflame Call
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Ghostflame Call</font>
info:
Drive the armament forward to manifest a burst of <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> ghostflame that applies 20 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>. A light attack follow-up leaves a burning trail that inflicts 20 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> per tick while a strong attack enlarges the explosion to 80; all variants still apply the weapon hit's <font color="#E0B985">poise damage</font> (100% of the weapon's poise) on the opening thrust, and the light trail itself contributes no stance damage. This skill is not chargeable.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (no-input explosion):</font> 4
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (light input explosion):</font> 5
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (light input trail):</font> 0
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (heavy input explosion):</font> 11
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (no-input explosion):</font> 20
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (trail, per tick):</font> 20
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (heavy explosion):</font> 80

name: Dragonwound Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Dragonwound Slash</font>
info:
Leap through the air while cloaked in jagged gravel stone, charging the attack to fire the aura as additional damage alongside the high slash; the charge is pure <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> and the combo hits for 33 total (16.5 from the slash plus 16.5 from the projectile). Inflicts 20% increased damage on Dragons and Ancient Dragons.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (uncharged):</font> 22
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged slash):</font> 16.5
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged projectile):</font> 16.5

name: Needle Piercer
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Needle Piercer</font>
info:
Generate ten gold needles that pierce at once, purging any ailments or special effects from pierced foes while the sword swipe and needles deal mostly <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> with only a minor <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> component. The sword swipe hits for 8.3 stance damage, the needles add 11 total (1.1 each), and when attacking unaware enemies only the first projectile gains the surprise damage bonus. This skill is not chargeable but can be parried.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (sword swipe):</font> 8.3
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (needles):</font> 11

name: Light
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Light</font>
info:
Launch the armament upward to unleash a cone of blinding light whose rays sweep through the area ahead; the skill cannot be parried, each ray hits up to four times, and the caster cannot cancel or perform other actions until the roughly 4.5 second animation finishes. Each ray deals pure <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Faith</font>, and casting also applies a body buff that increases holy damage by 20% for 60 seconds, ignores Old Lord's Talisman and other spell-duration modifiers, and does not stack with other body-buff holy damage boosts.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (per ray hit):</font> 5 (<font color="#E0B985">Faith</font>)

name: Darkness
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Darkness</font>
info:
Raise the sword and cleave with darkness to form a veil that conceals the caster while blinding foes around them; enemies tagged by the veil have their aggro reset, remain blinded for about 7 seconds, and temporarily suffer reduced <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font>.

The Two Fingers incantation costs 24 stamina, does not work against certain enemies (notably most bosses), and in PvP it does not prevent lock-on, though it still masks your actions while inside the veil.

See Buffs & Debuffs for more information on stacking the debuff.

name: Onze's Line of Stars
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Onze's Line of Stars</font>
info:
Imbue lined glintstones with sorcerous energy to slash once, then continue through up to two follow-up attacks that each hit harder than the last. The combo totals 30 stance damage, scales with the weapon's attack rating, and is boosted by multi-hit talismans and the Thorny Cracked Tear.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (full combo):</font> 30

name: The Poison Flower Blooms Twice
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: The Poison Flower Blooms Twice</font>
info:
Conjure a scarlet-rot-laden stinger beneath yourself to stab the enemy and kick up a shockwave on impact; the dive-kick inflicts 160 Scarlet Rot buildup while the wave only adds physical damage, and both hits scale solely with Weapon Level and gain damage from Shattered Stone Talisman. The shockwave inflicts no Scarlet Rot buildup on its own. If the dive-kick lands on a foe already afflicted with any <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> or <font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot</font>, detonate it for 5% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 250 damage (the same detonation as Poison Moth Flight) and purge the ailment, but only the dive-kick can trigger that detonation and it will not occur if you lack the <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> to spawn the stinger and shockwave. If performed without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, neither component materializes, so the detonation cannot trigger.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.18% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 15, every second for 90 seconds, for a total of 16.2% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 1350 damage when the dive-kick lands.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (dive-kick):</font> 150
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (shockwave):</font> 70
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation (stinger):</font> 160

name: Spinning Guillotine
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Spinning Guillotine</font>
info:
Hold the putrid blade at both ends, arch backward for a powerful overhead chop, and keep inputting to spin continuously while draining <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> and 7 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> per spin; repeated inputs let you keep turning until the resources run dry. The strong attack follow-up launches into a jumping spinning slash that also costs 7 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, and the skill is not chargeable.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (initial chop):</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (each spin):</font> 7
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (jumping follow-up):</font> 30

name: Unending Dance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Unending Dance</font>
info: Perform a furious succession of slashes and hold the button to sustain the dance for as long as <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> and <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> allow, continuously draining both while you spin. The Dancer's Set increases the damage of this skill, and it is not chargeable.

name: Revenger's Blade
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Revenger's Blade</font>
info:
Dash up to an enemy with blades in each hand, holding the button to extend the dash while it costs 15 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> and deals 5 stance damage; follow with a strong attack that hacks the enemy to pieces for 10 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> and adds 24.4 stance damage, for 29.4 total. Only the initial dash is chargeable (Godfrey Icon affects that attack alone) while the follow-up cannot be charged, and the skill is parriable.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (dash):</font> 5
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (follow-up):</font> 24.4

name: Mists of Eternal Sleep
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Mists of Eternal Sleep</font>

Release a velvety purple mist across a wide frontal area that inflicts <font color="#A698F4">Eternal Sleep</font> accumulation on touch; the mist is not chargeable and the weapon remains imbued for 30 seconds, adding 15 <font color="#A698F4">Eternal Sleep</font> accumulation per attack while it persists.

<font color="#A698F4">Sleep:</font> Reduces FP by 30 then forces the enemy to sleep for 60 seconds, or until any damage is received, typically allowing for a critical attack.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (weapon hitbox):</font> 6.5
<font color="#A698F4">Base Eternal Sleep accumulation (mist):</font> 112
<font color="#A698F4">Base Eternal Sleep accumulation (weapon buff):</font> 15

name: Dynastic Sickleplay
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Dynastic Sickleplay</font>
info:
Perform a finessed evasive backstep that gives directional control, then chain two additional strong attack inputs for an advancing upward slash followed by a downward bring-back strike; the skill grants 20 i-frames, is not chargeable, and the initial follow-up consumes no FP while landing three hits (10 + 2.5 + 10) before the FP-consuming finisher.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (initial follow-up):</font> 22.5
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (FP follow-up):</font> 33

name: Blinkbolt: Twinaxe
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Blinkbolt: Twinaxe</font>
info:
From a low stance, transform into a bolt of lightning and charge straight ahead at fulgurous speed; the strong attack follow-up is a lightning-charged spinning slash. The dash mirrors the standard Blinkbolt Ash of War, is not chargeable, grants invulnerability frames only when FP is used, and is boosted by pieces of the Death Knight Set.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 30

name: Blinkbolt: Long-hafted Axe
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Blinkbolt: Long-hafted Axe</font>
info:
From a low stance, transform into a bolt of lightning and charge straight ahead at fulgurous speed; the strong attack follow-up is a lightning-charged leaping slash. The dash mirrors the standard Blinkbolt Ash of War, is not chargeable, grants invulnerability frames only when FP is used, and is boosted by pieces of the Death Knight Set.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 33

name: Promised Consort
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Promised Consort</font>
info:
Imbue the twin greatswords with the light of Miquella, delivering a slash accompanied by columns of <font color="#F5EB89">holy light</font> and chaining up to two additional follow-up attacks; the light pillars deal Holy damage that scales with Intelligence and the skill is not chargeable.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (opener):</font> 15

name: Shadow Sunflower Headbutt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Shadow Sunflower Headbutt</font>
info:
Slam the blossom downward to send a flattening shockwave and then chain two follow-up slams through repeated inputs for a furious four-hit sequence that ends with a crashing finale.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (opener):</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (second slam):</font> 15
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (final slam):</font> 30
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (full combo):</font> 65

name: Moon-and-Fire Stance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Moon-and-Fire Stance</font>
info: Assume the ready stance to imbue each sword with opposing light and fire, then chain normal attacks to launch glintstone light waves (each light attack allows up to two additional light-wave casts) before finishing with a heavy input that spins into a flaming tornado that drenches the area in <font color="#F48C25">fire</font> and ends with flaming pillars. The stance still functions while another light greatsword is powerstanced in the offhand and benefits from Rellana's Cameo plus the Shard of Alexander.

name: Devonia's Vortex
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Devonia's Vortex</font>
info:
Violently spin the hammer and slam the ground to unleash a Crucible shockwave; the skill is chargeable, with the uncharged release flattening foes and a full charge striking even harder, and the Crucible Axe Set, Crucible Tree Set, and Crucible Hammer-Helm further enhance the impact.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (uncharged):</font> 27.5
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged):</font> 52.5

name: Messmer's Assault
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Messmer's Assault</font>
info:
Drive a series of spear thrusts wreathed in <font color="#F48C25">fire</font>, allowing up to two follow-up attacks before the final thrust slams into the ground and spawns countless spears around you. Counts as a Fire Knight skill, and damage is boosted by 10% while wearing the Winged Serpent Helm.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (full combo):</font> 42

name: Sleep Evermore
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Sleep Evermore</font>
info:
Pierce with a toxin-coated needle to inflict <font color="#A698F4">Eternal Sleep</font>, dealing significantly more damage to foes already in slumber or eternal sleep (targets stunned by sleep also count), and the skill can be parried.

<font color="#A698F4">Sleep:</font> Reduces FP by 30 then forces the enemy to sleep for 60 seconds, or until any damage is received, typically allowing for a critical attack.

<font color="#A698F4">Base Eternal Sleep accumulation:</font> 97

name: Golden Crux
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Golden Crux</font>
info:
Leap up and skewer foes from overhead, unfolding the barbs to excruciate from within on a hit while the follow-up input spawns piercing barbs that knock enemies into the air. Consumes <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> when the hit connects; without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> the hits lose 25% damage and the beam is not fired.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (pierce):</font> 17
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (holy):</font> 16

name: Moore's Charge
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Moore's Charge</font>
info:
Ready the shield with both hands and charge forward while guarding, ending in a verdigris shove that knocks back and down nearby foes; holding the input extends the length of the charge and the verdigris AoE at the end knocks down multiple enemies.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 30
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (final blast):</font> 12

name: White Light Charge
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: White Light Charge</font>
info:
Summon white light from the meteoric ore to charge through foes, then use an additional input to detonate an immediate white light explosion around you. This skill is not chargeable.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 24

name: Rancor Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Rancor Slash</font>
info:
Spin around to slash foes while summoning five vengeful spirit skulls that chase enemies and deal <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>; use an additional input for a follow-up attack, and each strike builds <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite</font> on contact.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

name: Witching Hour Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Witching Hour Slash</font>
info:
Hold the sword level, infuse it with Night, and unleash an incorporeal series of attacks that cannot be blocked or parried; charging increases their power, and the skill is buffed by the Godfrey Icon, Shard of Alexander, multi-hit talismans such as Rotten Winged Sword Insignia, and the Thorny Cracked Tear.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (uncharged):</font> 14
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged):</font> 27

name: Euporia Vortex
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Euporia Vortex</font>
info:
Twirl the armament through the vortex to unleash five hits directly ahead while the blade glows with restored luster; if the weapon was charged beforehand the vortex also fires a beam of light from its center and the animation stretches to ten hits. The unique skill costs <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> 28 and cannot be charged.

When the blades are fully charged before activation, the beam widens, the duration and <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> consumption double, each hit consumes <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> separately, the beam can track with the vortex and knock down humanoids if its final hit connects, it benefits from Rotten Winged Sword Insignia-style bonuses without adding charges to those effects, and rolling will cancel the skill while still expending the charges once the input ends.

Shard of Alexander and Warrior Jar Shard boost the damage of both the physical hits and the beam by 15% and 10%, respectively.

If the skill is used without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, the weapon stays dull, every hit suffers roughly a 75% damage penalty, the beam cannot fire, and the charges are not consumed again until enough <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> is recovered.

name: Smithing Art Spears
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Smithing Art Spears</font>
info:
Slam the red-hot anvil into the ground to send up countless spears that vanish instantly; this unique skill costs <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> 18, shares the animation with Eruption, and cannot be charged.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 45

name: Rancor Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Rancor Slash</font>
info:
Spin around to slash foes while summoning five vengeful spirit skulls that chase enemies and detonate for <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>; use an additional input for a follow-up attack, and each strike plus skull explosion inflicts <font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite</font> even if the weapon whiffs, since the skulls continue chasing until they connect. The skill costs <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> 12, is not chargeable, and shares a similar animation with Sword Dance.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

name: Romina's Purification
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Romina's Purification</font>
info:
Imbue the bud-blade with scarlet rot butterflies, then unleash two sweeping slashes so the butterflies erupt after a short delay; the unique skill costs <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> 24, deals physical damage, and cannot be charged. Every slash and each butterfly explosion inflicts <font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot</font> while the butterflies vanish instantly.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.33% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 33, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (first slash):</font> 8.5
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (second slash):</font> 11
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (butterfly explosion):</font> 2
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation (per slash):</font> 110
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation (butterfly explosion):</font> 22

name: Poison Spear-Hand Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Poison Spear-Hand Strike</font>
info:
Shape your hand into a spear and plunge through the enemy to inject deadly poison; the unique skill costs <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> 13, is not chargeable, and applies a large dose of <font color="#40BF40">Deadly Poison</font> buildup that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Arcane</font>.

<font color="#40BF40">Deadly Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.14% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 14, every second for 30 seconds (4.2% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 420 total).

<font color="#40BF40">Base deadly poison accumulation:</font> 155 (weapon <font color="#E0B985">Arcane</font> scaling; 415 at 60 <font color="#E0B985">Arcane</font>)

name: Madding Spear-Hand Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Madding Spear-Hand Strike</font>
info:
Form your hand into a spear and stab through a foe to drive them mad, only threatening Tarnished <font color="#E0B985">mind</font>s.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 305

name: Feeble Lord's Frenzied Flame
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Feeble Lord's Frenzied Flame</font>
info:
Raise the torch and exhale a stream of frenzied flame while moving, sustaining the spray for as long as the input is held until <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> is exhausted. The cone deals <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> that scales with fire buffs and rapidly builds <font color="#EEAA2B">Madness</font> on everything caught in the blaze, including the user.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

name: Repeating Fire
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Repeating Fire</font>
info:
Prime the repeating mechanism, then crank out 12 bolts: the first shot has a brief spin-up and the remaining 11 leave in a rapid stream that you can sweep manually if unlocked. Shots suffer a 67.65% damage penalty, 45% status buildup penalty, and 50% <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> penalty versus normal bolts, worsening to roughly 90% damage loss if fired without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>. <font color="#E0B985">Stamina</font> is spent per shot so interruptions stop further drain, but the full <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> cost is paid as soon as the first bolt launches.

<font color="#E0B985">Stamina cost (per bolt):</font> 10

name: Deadly Dance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Deadly Dance</font>
info:
Spin forward with paired circular blades to shred foes, then add an input to unleash a sharp axe-kick finisher. The whole skill counts as a dancing attack, and the follow-up also counts as a kick.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (initial dance):</font> 16
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (axe-kick):</font> 15

name: Fan Shot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Fan Shot</font>
info:
Hold the bow horizontally to ready eight notched arrows, then fire them in a fan whenever you press light or heavy attack while the stance is active.

Each volley consumes 8 of the chosen arrow type along with <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> and <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font>, letting a quiver of 99 arrows supply 12 volleys with 3 arrows left. Every projectile in the spread carries the properties of the slotted ammunition.

name: Discus Hurl
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Discus Hurl</font>
info: Hurl the roundshield like a smithing-infused discus that hangs in the air for a heartbeat before spinning vertically to chase its target, then re-materializes in your hand. The shield keeps pursuing even as you reposition, delivering a mobile homing strike without needing to retrieve the armament manually. This skill is not chargeable.

name: Flower Dragonbolt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Flower Dragonbolt</font>
info:
Call down red dragon lightning onto a target and hold to charge the thrust for greater effect. The lightning blast scales with <font color="#E0B985">Arcane</font> and benefits from charged skill buffs. Cannot be parried.

Inflicts a unique debuff that increases <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> taken by 12% (17% when fully charged) for 20 seconds, stacking alongside other Power Shred debuffs.

name: Kowtower's Resentment
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Kowtower's Resentment</font>
info:
Force the finger weapon into a resentful bow that charges while held, then slam it down to vent the pent-up anger in successive shockwaves. Holding the input increases the resentment before impact, but the skill does not benefit from charged attack buffs and only the weapon hitbox counts toward skill buffs while the holy shockwaves never do.

The weapon slam scales purely with weapon attack rating, whereas the shockwaves deal <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Faith</font>; Shard of Alexander affects only the weapon hitbox and leaves the holy AoE unchanged.

name: Painful Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Painful Strike</font>
info:
Unleash a chastening flurry of whip strikes that layers <font color="#40BF40">Deadly Poison</font> onto the victim while reducing <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by 8 for 30 seconds. Cannot be parried. This skill is not chargeable.

<font color="#40BF40">Deadly Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.14% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 14, every second for 30 seconds.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 14

name: Solitary Moon Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Solitary Moon Slash</font>
info:
Deliver a downward slash that launches a moonlit arc, then chain into a lunging horizontal sweep with the strong attack; holding strong lets you delay the follow-up to make the timing less predictable. The opener does 11 stance damage and the follow-up another 28 (39 total), and this skill is not chargeable.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (opener):</font> 11
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (follow-up):</font> 28

name: Revenge of the Night
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Revenge of the Night</font>
info:
Launch a Night-infused bolt that deals <font color="#57DBCE">Magic damage</font> scaling with <font color="#E0B985">Dexterity</font> and costs 5 FP; casting it immediately after blocking absorbs the incoming blow and converts that energy into a guard-counter retaliation that roughly triples the projectile's power while delivering 15 stance damage.

The skill is not chargeable, and the projectile damage can still be boosted by Shard of Alexander and Magic Scorpion Charm even though Curved Sword Talisman and Deflecting Hardtear have no effect.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 3
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (guard counter):</font> 15

name: Weed Cutter
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Weed Cutter</font>
info:
Scythe through foes with broad horizontal swings, chaining the motion for as long as stamina remains while each hit consumes 8 FP, letting repeated inputs keep the barrage active until those resources run out; the skill is not chargeable.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (per hit):</font> 11

name: Blindfold of Happiness
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Blindfold of Happiness</font>
info: Swing your head while covering your eyes to unleash a lamenting wail that veils you from sight for 15 seconds, reducing enemy detection the same way as Unseen Form; the invisibility persists even if Crepus's Vial or Black Knife Armor hide the visual effect. The skill is not chargeable.

name: Jori's Inquisition
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Jori's Inquisition</font>
info:
Thrust the greatstaff overhead to launch streams of golden barbs that deal <font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage</font>, holding the button to sustain the barrage briefly while manually aiming the rapid projectiles via camera free aim; the skill consumes 6 FP per activation or 42 FP for the full duration.

The projectiles appear to inflict <font color="#C84343">Blood Loss accumulation</font> (listed as a possible bug), making the skill useful against large enemies vulnerable to Holy damage.

name: Roaring Bash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Roaring Bash</font>
info:
Roar from behind your guard to drive a shield bash that erupts in a wide shockwave, knocking back and staggering surrounding foes while behaving identically to Shield Bash and delivering the same area knockback.

The skill costs 12 FP, is not chargeable, Freyja's Greatsword passively boosts its damage by 10% while equipped, and Roar Medallion has no effect when using the skill.

name: Deadly Poison Spray
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Deadly Poison Spray</font>
info:
Swing the perfume bottle overhead to release a 7-second cloud of <font color="#40BF40">Deadly Poison</font> that inflicts buildup on anyone insideeven yourselfwhile the lingering fumes stay hidden from enemies. The 21 FP cast cannot be charged or parried and locks you into the animation until roughly 2.5 seconds after the spray completes, forcing you to wait for the mist to fade.

The skill can be used to manually trigger Kindred of Rot's Exultation, Mushroom Crown, and the Poisoned Hand, but the long duration means you'll need to retreat or wait for the poison to dissipate before moving on.

<font color="#40BF40">Deadly Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.14% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 14, every second for 30 seconds.

<font color="#40BF40">Base Deadly Poison accumulation per tick:</font> 10 (weapon <font color="#E0B985">Arcane</font> scaling)

name: Flare, O Serpent
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Flare, O Serpent</font>
info:
Ignite the serpents to add 90 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> to your armament for 30 seconds; the 8 FP buff cannot be charged, and heavy attacks or ground-slamming actions trigger a 12 stance damage explosion that consumes the enchantment, requiring the skill to be recast before another blast. Triggering explosions with paired Serpent Flails detonates both weapons simultaneously, Shard of Alexander only buffs the blast, and the Winged Serpent Helm buffs the effect. Counts as a Fire Knight skill.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (explosion):</font> 12

name: Scattershot (Claws)
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Scattershot (Claws)</font>
info:
Conjure multiple spectral claws in each hand and hurl 28 projectiles at once; the volley can strike large enemies and bosses up to four times at a further reach, though it otherwise mirrors Scattershot Throw with slightly less range and moderate stagger. The 11 FP cast is unique, not chargeable, additional input allows a second scatter throw, and using the skill without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> launches only six claws.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 11.2

name: Hone Blade
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Hone Blade</font>
info: Stroke the blade to apply a 40-second weapon buff that increases damage by 6% (4% in PvP), shows as an AR increase, and causes each hit to restore 1% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>. The unique 16 FP cast cannot be charged, locks you into a roughly 3-second animation that does not alert enemies, and leaves the weapon glowing with sparkles along its edge. Counts as a weapon buff.

name: Horn Calling
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Horn Calling</font>
info:
Shroud the weapon in tangled horns, drive it into the ground, and call up piercing spikes that erupt below the enemy, delivering pure <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Faith</font>. The 17 FP unique cast cannot be charged and keeps the horns protruding beneath the target before you can act again.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (spikes):</font> 12

name: Horn Calling: Storm
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Horn Calling: Storm</font>
info:
Infuse the horned blade with storm winds, then mow through enemies with a sweeping spin that strikes repeatedly at far greater range than Stormcaller. Each hit triggers multi-hit talisman effects, and two follow-up inputs extend the combo while the skill cannot be charged. Enraged Divine Beast boosts the damage by 10%.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (first sweep):</font> 24.2
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (follow-up spins):</font> 16.5

name: Tremendous Phalanx
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Tremendous Phalanx</font>
info:
Raise your weapon to summon a defensive arch of three homing glintblades overhead, each automatically firing as nearby foes approach. The strong attack follow-up chains into a lunging thrust that propels you forward, and the skill cannot be charged.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (each glintblade):</font> 8
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (follow-up thrust):</font> 15

name: Bloodfiends' Bloodboon
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Bloodfiends' Bloodboon</font>
info:
Drive the spear through your target to detonate a ranged bloodflame eruption that deals <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> and inflicts <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> around them rather than around yourself. Additional inputs chain up to three thrusts, with the third stab dealing increased damage but suffering a longer recovery, and the skill never coats the weapon in bloodflame. The skill is not chargeable.

<font color="#C84343">Blood Loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

name: Dragonform Flame
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Dragonform Flame</font>
info: Transform your arm into a draconic maw to sweep a gout of fire in front of you, leaving burning ground that lingers briefly, identical to the Firebreather skill. Using the skill without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> causes a harmless sputter with no flames, and the skill cannot be charged.

name: Lightspeed Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Lightspeed Slash</font>
info:
Assume a luminous form to leap forward for a downward slash, then unleash radiant beams that disperse <font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage</font> scaling with <font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>. Charging increases the power and number of follow-up attacks, and the fully charged version benefits from the Godfrey Icon.

<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 20
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged):</font> 32

name: Rancor Shot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Rancor Shot</font>
info: Adopt a stance to imbue your arrows with vengeful spirits, firing rapid shots that home in on foes like Barrage while consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> for each arrow. Maintaining the stance slows movement and reduces <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by 80% until you release the aim.
